title: Can't get 975 RP mystery skin gift
body: My friend tried to gift me today and yesterday and he cannot send the 975 RP gift it says I've reached my max limit i hadn't had any gifts in weeks before it. so its obviously incorrect tried re logging but it didn't change anything any suggestions?

replies.body: Hey there, sorry about that. We've since corrected an issue in the store causing this gift option to fail, so you should be able to give and receive mystery chests now.

There are various limits and restrictions concerning gifts, and it's possible that Riot haven't made error messages for every possible scenario. Look up the 'requirements' [for Mystery Gifting](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752934-Mystery-Gifting-FAQ) and [gifts in general](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752964-Gifting-Guide-and-FAQ).
